unnormalised: SpiceJet flight SG 203 from Delhi was delayed by 3 hrs due to bad weather, guys! Initially scheduled for departure at 6:00 AM on 24/12/2024, it's now expected to leave around 9:00 AM. Passengers are requested to check the airport display for updates; I know it's a total buzzkill if you’re rushing home for Christmas, so prepone travel plans accordingly.
normalised: SpiceJet flight S-G two zero three from Delhi was delayed by three hours due to bad weather, guys! Initially scheduled for departure at six zero zero A-M on twenty fourth december two thousand and twenty four, it's now expected to leave around nine zero zero A-M. Passengers are requested to check the airport display for updates; I know it's a total buzzkill if you’re rushing home for Christmas, so prepone travel plans accordingly.

unnormalised: Railway authorities have also announced changes; the Rajdhani Express from Mumbai CST to Delhi, usually departing at 2:30 PM, will be running approx. 2 hrs late. Expected time of arrival in Delhi is now 10:30 AM on 25/12/2024, instead of the usual 8:30 AM.
normalised: Railway authorities have also announced changes; the Rajdhani Express from Mumbai C-S-T to Delhi, usually departing at two thirty P-M, will be running approximately two hours late. Expected time of arrival in Delhi is now ten thirty A-M on twenty fifth december two thousand and twenty four, instead of the usual eight thirty A-M.

unnormalised: Passengers are advised to confirm schedules before heading to the stations or airports, especially around the holiday season. The airline and railway websites should have real-time information and toll-free numbers to call, so double check. Happy holidays, and travel safe!
normalised: Passengers are advised to confirm schedules before heading to the stations or airports, especially around the holiday season. The airline and railway websites should have real-time information and toll-free numbers to call, so double check. Happy holidays, and travel safe!
